channel.title: NY Tech on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in NY Tech on C'est la Z

item.title: What companies look for in a tech hire
item.description: My friend Ria tweeted this earlier today: <blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">If you are a software developer/engineer, please reply with a trait (or traits) that you look for in hiring new engineers (new grads). This can be something you glean from a resume, technical interview, behavorial interview, or all of the above.</p>&mdash; Ria Galanos (@cscheerleader) <a href="https://twitter.com/cscheerleader/status/1185937705689112577?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">October 20, 2019</a></blockquote> <script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script> I'm not hiring for a tech company but I thought I'd share some thoughts anyway.
